name: Doodle Jump VS
description:
Now you can play “the most addictive game ever” for cash and prizes against the players all over the world. Match up against players at three different skill levels.

How high can you get?
Journey up a sheet of graph paper, jumping from one platform to the next, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players to earn cash or virtual currency. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive!

The special edition of Doodle Jump includes the Skillz eSports platform, featuring leaderboards, tournaments, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing.

Features:
- Skillz eSports platform: play for cash or prizes against people around the world
- The most intuitive controls: Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot
- Awesome power-ups to pick-up (JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, spring shoes, trampolines...)
- Trippy obstacles to avoid (UFOs, black holes, and many, many monstrous monsters)
- Mad platforms to jump on (Broken, moving, disappearing, shifting, EXPLODING…)

Note: Currency deposit is required for cash prize matches and tournaments

Appropriate for users 17+
